data: “Well, this is cheerful!” cried the Infant, as she stepped briskly into the room where the rest of the “Set” were dejectedly assembled.
“WELL, this is cheerful!” cried the Infant, as she stepped briskly into the room where the rest of the “Set” were dejectedly assembled.
When She Came Home from College
McNeely, Marian Hurd, 1877-1930; Wilson, Jean Bingham; Gibbs, George, 1870-1942 [Illustrator]
